Package classes

Class Player

java.lang.Object
classes.Player
public class Player extends Object
Player is a class that handles everything that is or is the result of the user's action

  • Method Details

    • changeItem

      public static void changeItem(int i, Item e)
      Method for changing selected Items of player. Changes the index i of Player's selectedItems to a certain Item
      Parameters:
      i - Number of the clicker button that is to be changed
      e - Item that clicker button will select

    • selectItem

      public static void selectItem(Item e) throws MaxItemSelectedException
      Puts an Item in Player's selected Items
      Parameters:
      e - Item to be selectedd
      Throws:
      MaxItemSelectedException

    • selectCourier

      public static Courier selectCourier(String n) throws CourierNotFoundException
      Returns a courier with the same name as the inputted String
      Parameters:
      n - Name of the courier
      Returns:
      Courier with a name that is the same as the inputted String
      Throws:
      CourierNotFoundException - If the Courier with the same name as the inputted String was not found in the list of Couriers

      public static void inventoryAdd(Item e)
      Adds an item to the player's inventory

    • clicked

      public static void clicked(Item e)
      Adds yoPerClick to the clicked item's progress. It also increases player's yarn coins by the player's yoPerClick
      Parameters:
      e - Item clicked

    • playerCrochetersDoWork

      public static void playerCrochetersDoWork()
      Runs crochet method for all crocheters in playersCrocheters

    • playerPaySalary

      public static void playerPaySalary()
      Calculates the total salary from the salary of all of Player's crochter and courier, and then deducts that from the Player's current yarn coins

    • YarnOverPerClickMultiplier

      public static void YarnOverPerClickMultiplier(double playerEffect)
      Multiplies yoPerClick of player by the double playerEffect input
      Parameters:
      playerEffect - Inputted multiplier to yoPerClick

    • playerCrocheterMultiplier

      public static void playerCrocheterMultiplier(double crocheterEffect)
      Multiplies a multiplier effect to yarnOverRate of each of the Player's Crocheter
      Parameters:
      crocheterEffect - Multiplier that is to be multiplied to the Crocheter's yarnOverRate

    • playerCourierMultiplier

      public static void playerCourierMultiplier(double courierEffect)
      Multiplies a multiplier effect to the speed of each of the Player's courier
      Parameters:
      courierEffect - Multiplier that is to be multiplied to the Crocheter's speed
